title: Plan Subsea Well Intervention
description: A subsea engineer plans an intervention on a subsea well using a remotely operated vehicle (ROV) to replace a faulty sensor.

tasks.description: Identify the faulty sensor and the specific ROV tooling required to replace it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct replacement part and ROV tools are identified.

tasks.description: Develop a detailed, step-by-step procedure for the ROV to perform the replacement operation.
tasks.expected_outcome: A safe and efficient work procedure is written.

tasks.description: Book a vessel with an ROV and schedule the intervention in the offshore operational plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The vessel and crew are booked, and the job is added to the 90-day plan.
